articles.title: Sen. Josh Hawley to probe Meta AI policies for children following damning report
articles.summary: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., said Friday that he will investigate Meta following a report that the company approved rules allowing artificial intelligence chatbots to have certain “romantic” and “sensual” conversations with children
articles.translated_title: Sen. Josh Hawley to probe Meta AI policies for children following damning report
articles.translated_summary: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., said Friday that he will investigate Meta following a report that the company approved rules allowing artificial intelligence chatbots to have certain “romantic” and “sensual” conversations with children

articles.title: Researchers Used AI To Kill Drug-Resistant Bacteria
articles.summary: MIT researchers used AI to kill drug-resistant gonorrhea and MRSA bacteria. Dive into how artificial intelligence facilitated this discovery.
articles.translated_title: Researchers Used AI To Kill Drug-Resistant Bacteria
articles.translated_summary: MIT researchers used AI to kill drug-resistant gonorrhea and MRSA bacteria. Dive into how artificial intelligence facilitated this discovery.

articles.title: U.S. Senator Hawley launches probe into Meta AI policies
articles.summary: U.S. Senator Josh Hawley launched a probe into Facebook parent Meta Platforms' artificial intelligence policies on Friday, demanding documents on rules that had allowed its artificial intelligence chatbots to “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual.”
articles.translated_title: U.S. Senator Hawley launches probe into Meta AI policies
articles.translated_summary: U.S. Senator Josh Hawley launched a probe into Facebook parent Meta Platforms' artificial intelligence policies on Friday, demanding documents on rules that had allowed its artificial intelligence chatbots to “engage a child in conversations that are romantic or sensual.”

articles.title: Beware 'drone-tastic' thinking: UK armed forces chief says 'traditional' capabilities still matter
articles.summary: Adm. Tony Radakin also warned, however, that whoever gets to "artificial super intelligence" first will dominate on the battlefield.

articles.summary: Let's revisit the AI classic, in an age where AI itself has become a buzzword.

articles.title: Why the Best AI Films Don’t Feel Artificial at All
articles.summary: No matter how far AI advances, film production will always be driven by visionaries with stories to tell.

articles.title: Top Silicon Valley exec reveals the ‘stupidest thing’ companies adopting AI can do
articles.summary: The president of Cisco rejects the doomsday warnings from some tech leaders that artificial intelligence will make entry-level jobs vanish.

articles.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman expects to spend ‘trillions’ on infrastructure
articles.summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman wants to spend trillions of dollars over time on the infrastructure required to develop and run artificial intelligence services. He just needs to figure out a way to raise that kind of money.

articles.title: Meta’s superintelligence dream team will be management challenge of the century
articles.summary: Meta is spending a fortune to assemble the brightest minds in artificial intelligence. Research suggests that packing a team with too much genius can backfire.
